item.title: Reclining airplane seats : work of the Devil!
item.description: Reclining airplane seats!! I shake my fist at thee. This one feature on airplanes has caused me untold miseries. Ok! I exaggerate .. a little. I live Vancouver, which is one the other side of the planet with respect to my hometown. As a result, I spend at least 30 hours on an plane, once a year. To compound, my 6' 5" (196 cm) frame does not mix well with cramped spaces.
